mapper.select: SELECT soc_seq, mb_id, soc_title, soc_position, soc_team, soc_content, soc_create_at, soc_update_at FROM jsp.soccer order by soc_update_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jsp.soccer ( mb_id, soc_title, soc_position, soc_team, soc_content ) VALUES ( #{mbId}, #{socTitle}, #{socPosition}, #{socTeam}, #{socContent} )

INSERT INTO jsp.soccerfiles ( soc_seq, mb_id, soc_up_original_file_name, soc_up_new_file_name, soc_up_file_path, soc_up_file_size ) VALUES ( #{socSeq}, #{mbId}, #{socUpOriginalFileName}, #{socUpNewFileName}, #{socUpFilePath}, #{socUpFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jsp.soccer SET soc_seq=#{socSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, soc_title=#{socTitle}, soc_position=#{socPosition}, soc_team=#{socTeam}, soc_content=#{socContent}, soc_update_at=now() WHERE soc_seq=#{socSeq}

UPDATE jsp.soccerfiles SET soc_seq=#{socSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, soc_up_original_file_name=#{socUpOriginalFileName}, soc_up_new_file_name=#{socUpNewFileName}, soc_up_file_path=#{socUpFilePath}, soc_up_file_size=#{socUpFileSize} WHERE soc_seq=#{socSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT soc_seq, mb_id, soc_title, soc_content, soc_create_at, soc_update_at FROM jsp.soccer where soc_seq = #{socSeq}
